hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOTR.EOTR_ID as EOOE_ID, EOTR.CREATOR as CREATOR, EOTR.CREATE_TIME as CREATE_TIME, EOTR.MODIFIER as MODIFIER, EOTR.MODIFY_TIME as MODIFY_TIME, EOTR.REC_VER as REC_VER, EOTR.REC_STATUS as REC_STATUS, EOTR.ORG_ID as ORG_ID, EOTR.PM_CODE as PM_CODE, EOTR.EOTR_REMARK_CODE as EOOE_REMARK_CODE, EOTR.EOTR_REMARK_NAME as EOOE_REMARK_NAME, EOTR.EOTR_VALUE_CODE as EOOE_VALUE_CODE, EOTR.EOTR_VALUE_NAME as EOOE_VALUE_NAME, EOTR.EOTR_TYPE as EOOE_TYPE, EOTR.EOTR_PARAMETER as EOOE_PARAMETER, EOTR.EOTR_INITIALIZE as EOOE_INITIALIZE, EOTR.EOTR_REQUIRE as EOOE_REQUIRE, EOTR.EOTR_MODIFIED as EOOE_MODIFIED from EO_TEMPLATE_ORDER_REMARK EOTR where 1=1 << AND EOTR.EOTR_EOTO_CODE LIKE :code>> << AND EOTR.ORG_ID =:orgId >>
